TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Of course. It's a dystopia, after all.

Waiter! This chickenburger is so old that you should rename it into henburger.

We will be sure to Pullet.

Some sliced root vegetables and pieces of meat in hot water please.

Your chipsoup is ready, sir.

Fugu fish, please. And scuba gear to breath.

You really should order Last Breath. 

Waiter! The Big Brother's picture is IN the soup! I can't bear it!

It's painted on the very bottom of the plate. You anyway can't see it.

Waiter! 7 up! It fell down.

Waiter: Place your bets, around and around it goes, where it will stop, nobody knows.

Customer: I like the red and black pattern of the bowl and the carry handle sticking out of the middle is novel but I would prefer some soup instead of this rather crunchy white crouton.

(Silently overturns the ice bucket into the bowl).
Your Arctic Crouton Soup, sir.

Waiter! A pair of chopsticks and open the window. I'll be catching the flies for my kungfu soup myself.

Edited November 10, 2022 by kerbiloid

15 hours ago, kerbiloid said:

Waiter! A pair of chopsticks and open the window. I'll be catching the flies for my kungfu soup myself.

We had fumigated the restaurant this weekend sir, may I suggest some dogs instead? Humm… Oh, wait!!!! 

Waiter! There's a PD Launcher on my soup!

Edited November 11, 2022 by Lisias
Grammars. Don't you hate this thing?

Oh sorry, we forgot to make it kerbalized, we can't bring it back to the kitchen, your waiter steam can't take it out, so you need to take it out yourself. 

There's a Christmas light in my gravy!

For $20 more you may have Christmas Premium.

Creature in the bowl! What are you, and where did you come from?

WARNING! CONTAINMENT BREACH DETECTED. ACTIVATING ALPHA WARHEAD NOW. 

WAITER! There's a bunch of Platinium irgot in my soup

Yes. Souped irgots from Platinium Swamp are a famous Argonian dish.

Diner! I want to dine!

Please don't disturb the other Diners sir. I am your waiter and will take your order.

Customer: There is a message in my soup.

The soup is a message itself.

Waiter! What's the dinee of this diner?

I don't know.

Waiter! There is a soup in my soup!

Yes, it's a nested soup.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edible_bird's_nest

Waiter! Are you sure that the bird nest soup should include sticks and feathers?

Sir did order the crunchy soup.

 

Waiter! There's a TARDIS in my soup.

Waiter: The soup is all relative.

Customer: Is there a purpose in my soup?

Purple tortoise in a soup?  Sir, you know a lot fun in the kitchen.

Waiter! Are you sure this chicken wasn't circling over the Colorado plains this morning?
Waiter! There is a terrorist in my soup!

Kaboom!!!

Waiter! Waiter... Waiter???

It is ok, we will have a candelight dinner.

Is that a wavy reflection of light in my soup?

No, it's your soup is glowing itself.

Waiter! Is the "rare steak" really impossible to find?

We prefer "Improbable."

Why is there a Cruise Liner in my soup? I did not order the Covid special.

Mr. Cruise visited us this week. Probably, it's a piece of liner from his coat.

Waiter! Can I order a can more?
